body:
hey,
I'm Evasionz and I want to talk to you about why and how I joined Avicus.

Recently a Really AWESOME guy told me about this server and I joined at first I thought dis server sucks.
But it doesn't as I found out lookin throught the hub and so forth.
I love Avicus and am a completely new player to the network.

Why, Because it is awesome!

Ask me anything below and I may get to it!

title: Hey guys!

replies.body: Glad you're enjoying it so far, even though you've been here for a long time.. Question: {Edit: Tanpopo answered it} What's your favorite color...?
